title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 419.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 419.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part shall apply to the special day care services
program authorized and funded by chapter 53 of the Laws of 1983 which
authorizes the department to provide 87 1/2 percent reimbursement for social
services district expenditures for day care services provided to encourage and
promote self-sufficiency. The department shall be authorized to provide
reimbursement to the social services districts pursuant to the special day care
services program so long as funds are appropriated to the department for such
purpose. The expanded day care opportunities developed through this program
will be for the development of day care services and a range of support
services directly linked to day care services such as transportation to support
training and employment of parents who have children in day care. This program
will benefit current or recent public assistance recipients and persons who
have lost day care because of budget reductions in services programs to insure
that persons in these groups have access to employment and training
opportunities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
419.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
